name: Den Theft Auto
description:
You are stealing from a sleeping bear to support your pawn shop. grab as much as you can and drop it behind your truck outside. Be sure to deal with hazards like alarm clocks that will wake the bear up. When you are ready to leave, interact with the truck's door to get out of there!

[Space] to pick up / interact

[F] to drop all held items

created for Winter MelonJam 2022

programming - Curosuvshado

art - mrshmoods

all sounds as well as certain images were used under the creative commons license
